new.title: New project
new.description: Create a new project to manage your projects.

edit.description: Edit the project to update its information.

destroy.title: Delete project
destroy.description: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.

destroyMany.title: Delete {{total}} projects
destroyMany.description: Are you sure you want to delete these projects? This action cannot be undone.

restore.title: Restore project
restore.description: Are you sure you want to restore this project?

restoreMany.title: Restore {{total}} projects
restoreMany.description: Are you sure you want to restore these projects?

logs.title: Logs
logs.description: View the change logs for this project.

cancel.title: Exit
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to exit? You have unsaved changes, they will be lost when confirmed

exclude.title: Delete project
exclude.description: This project will be permanently deleted, are you sure you want to continue?
